article:
{{Taxobox
| color = lightgrey name = Bacillales regnum = Bacteria phylum = Firmicutes
| classis = Bacilli ordo = 'Bacillales' subdivision_ranks = Families
| subdivision =
Alicyclobacillaceae Bacillaceae Caryophanaceae Listeriaceae
Paenibacillaceae Planococcaceae Sporolactobacillaceae
Staphylococcaceae Thermoactinomycetaceae Turicibacteraceae }} The
'Bacillales' are an order of Gram-positive bacteria, placed within the
Firmicutes. Representative genera include [[Bacillus]], [[Listeria]] and
[[Staphylococcus]].
